title: Healthcare Plan Details
description: Patient medical plan details such as network, type, and active status.

xdm:payerID.title: Payer ID
xdm:payerID.description: Unique identifier of the payer. This is the insurance provider of the plan.

xdm:payerName.title: Payer Name
xdm:payerName.description: Name of the payer. This is the insurance provider of the plan.

xdm:targetOwnerType.title: Target Owner Type
xdm:targetOwnerType.description: The type of owner a plan is for. Examples are individual, group, organization, etc.

xdm:isActive.title: Is Active
xdm:isActive.description: Indicates whether the plan is active.

xdm:networkID.title: Network Identifier
xdm:networkID.description: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate.

xdm:networkName.title: Network Name
xdm:networkName.description: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate.

xdm:planType.title: Plan Type
xdm:planType.description: This indicates if the plan is primary, secondary or a tertiary plan.

xdm:planLevel.title: Plan Level
xdm:planLevel.description: This indicates if the plan is primary, secondary, tertiary etc.

xdm:lastVerificationDate.title: Last Verification Date
xdm:lastVerificationDate.description: The date on which the plan was last verified.
